task.title: Dismissing Updates From Your Inbox
task.shortdesc: Maintaing an organized inbox will increase productivity and make sure you are up to date on information with your team. After a message has been read, it can be dismissed from view if it is no longer required.

step.cmd: To dismiss updates, select the blue circular button with the white check mark inside of it that floats to the right of your updates.
The update will now be dismissed and will no longer be seen unless the “All Updates” option is chosen.
